subject: Junitreport runs out of memory.
msgSnippet: Hi, tring to run the junit tests for hibernate. When I turn on debug logging, I get an out of memory error. Trying to add a jvmarg to in crease the heap fails
messageBody:
Hi, tring to run the junit tests for hibernate. When I turn on debug
logging, I get an out of memory error. Trying to add a jvmarg to in crease
the heap fails since that task says it does not support jvmarg.

Does anyone know of a workaround.

thanks
